card.name: Provisions Hauler
card.text: When this creature enters, create two 1/1 white Peasant creature tokens. Whenever this creature attacks, you may pay {4}{GW}. If you do, attacking Citizens and Peasants get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Assailed Farmer
card.text: First strike Sacrifice this creature: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Byron, Hero of Norwick
card.text: Other Citizens and Peasants you control get +1/+1. {2}{GW}: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Citizen or Peasant card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: For Hearth and Home
card.text: Choose one — • Create three 1/1 white Peasant creature tokens. • Creatures you control get +1/+2 until end of turn. Untap them.

card.name: Hugh, Usurper's Thorn
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it or it has mana value greater than the number of lands that player controls, counter that spell. {GW}, Sacrifice this creature: Citizens and Peasants you control get +1/+1 and gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Rose Queen Asamund
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Asamund attacks, choose up to one each of target Dwarf, Elf and Human. Those creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn. When you attack with at least one each of Dwarf, Elf, and Human, exile up to one target nonland permanent. Do this only once.

card.name: Grizzled Expeditioneer
card.text: Trample Whenever this creature attacks, you may tap another untapped Dwarf or Elf you control. If you do, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Invocation of Loisch
card.text: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is two plus the number of creatures you control. Exile up to two of them, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order. You may play the exiled cards until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Loisch, Stonebark Scorcher
card.text: Whenever another creature you control enters, Loisch deals 1 damage to any target. {4}{R}{G}: Loisch gets +X/+X and gains trample until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Perfect Partnership
card.text: When this enchantment enters, create your choice of a 1/1 red Dwarf creature token or a 1/1 green Elf creature token. At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target Dwarf and up to one target Elf each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Harl and Finn, Bloodbrothers
card.text: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the number of Dwarves and Elves you control. Trample, haste Whenever Harl and Finn attacks, other creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Fading Words
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Harrier Corps
card.text: Flash Flying Whenever this creature attacks, other creatures you control with flying get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Moment's Reprieve
card.text: Flash When this enchantment enters, if you cast it, you may return target spell or nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, create a 1/1 white and blue Bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Mellan, Skysworn Inductee
card.text: Flash Flying When Mellan enters, exile up to one other target nonland permanent with mana value equal to or less than the number of creatures you control with flying until Mellan leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Hark the Fleeting Host
card.text: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead. If you would draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, draw two cards instead. At the beginning of your end step, untap up to two lands.

card.name: Sky Commander Esmerie
card.text: Flash Flying Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, create a Weapon token. When you do, you may attach it to another target creature with flying. (It's an Equipment artifact token with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1".)

card.name: Henrick, the Fleeting King
card.text: Flash Flying, vigilance When Henrick enters, exile target spell. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it without paying its mana cost. Spells players cast from anywhere but their hands cost {X} more to cast, where X is the number of creatures with flying you control.

card.name: Celitiene, Wildfire
card.text: Whenever you cast a Dwarf or Elf spell, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. Whenever you cast your third spell each turn, Celitiene deals 2 damage to any target. If you control a Dwarf, Celitiene gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. If you control another Elf, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Kahra's Prototype
card.text: When this creature enters, put two -1/-1 counters on a creature you control. When this creature dies, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature for each -1/-1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Maritou's Bane
card.text: When this creature enters, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control. Whenever you put one or more -1/-1 counters on one or more creatures, surveil 2.

card.name: Yaran's Scheming
card.text: Draw two cards, then you may discard a card. If you do, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Ebitha, Supplicant of Decay
card.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life. If it had two or more counters on it, draw a card. {1}{U}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Lady Kahra Belmord
card.text: Deathtouch The first instant or sorcery spell with mana value 3 or less you cast each turn has siphon. (Each -1/-1 counter you put on your creatures up to their remaining toughness while casting this pays for {1}.)

card.name: Raven Roosts
card.text: Once each turn, when a creature card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, create a 1/1 blue and black Bird creature token with flying and "When this creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it. If you do, draw a card." Whenever three or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, that player loses 1 life for each card in your hand.

card.name: Yaran, Undying Usurper
card.text: Flying, deathtouch Whenever Yaran enters or attacks, target opponent may pay 3 life. If that player doesn't, they choose a nonland permanent they control. Tap that permanent. You gain control of it. (This effect doesn't end.)

card.name: Song of the Red Thirst
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains lifelink and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Brazen Chitter-Sage
card.text: Whenever this creature or another creature you control dies, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: The Marrow Lord
card.text: When The Marrow Lord enters, search your library for a card with arise, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle. Whenever you activate an ability of a card in your graveyard or a creature you control enters from a graveyard, this creature deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Dreadmoon's Rise
card.text: When this enchantment enters, create a 1/1 white Peasant creature token. {BR}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

card.name: Ratkin Rampage
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose a permanent type at random. Each player sacrifices a permanent of the chosen type other than this enchantment. If no permanents were sacrificed this way, sacrifice this enchantment and create a 6/6 black and red Rat Mutant creature token with trample and haste.

card.name: Dreadmoon Crusader
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, mill two cards and you lose 2 life. Arise {3}{B}{R} ({3}{B}{R}, Exile this from your graveyard as a sorcery: Create a black token of it that's also a Zombie and can't block.)

card.name: Pale Conquest
card.text: Target attacking or blocking creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. That creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn instead if you control a Knight or Soldier.

card.name: Oathbound Scion
card.text: Vigilance When this creature dies, target creature you control seeks secrets or valor. (Give it that Oath Aura. Fulfill Secrets by attacking with it and two or more other creatures to draw a card. Fulfill Valor by dealing combat damage to a player to create a 2/1 white Soldier token.)

card.name: Vel, the Forlorn Shield
card.text: Lifelink When Vel enters, choose up to one other target nonland permanent an opponent controls. If you gained or lost life this turn, exile that permanent until Vel leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Bloodstained Crusade
card.text: When this enchantment enters, target creature you control seeks valor. (Give it that Oath Aura. Fulfill it by it dealing combat damage to a player to create a 2/1 white Soldier token.) Whenever you fulfill an Oath of a Knight or Soldier, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying and "This creature can't block."

card.name: Desperate Commander
card.text: As long as this creature isn't a Zombie, it and other Knights and Soldiers you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance. Otherwise, it and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have menace. Arise {1}{W}{B} ({1}{W}{B}, Exile this from your graveyard as a sorcery: Create a black token of it that's also a Zombie and can't block.)

card.name: Bitter Defeat
card.text: You may reveal a Knight or Soldier card from your hand as you cast this spell. If you do or you control one as you cast it, you may cast it as though it had flash and it can't be countered. Exile target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.

card.name: Rhysta, Bladebound
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay 3 life. If you do, target creature seeks secrets or valor. (Give it that Oath Aura. Fulfill Secrets by attacking with it and two or more other creatures to draw a card. Fulfill Valor by dealing combat damage to a player to create a 2/1 white Soldier token.) Whenever you fulfill an Oath, each opponent sacrifices a nonland permanent.

card.name: Gamhaugen Drillbore
card.text: {T}: Surveil 1. Crew 2 Whenever one or more cards leaves your graveyard, this artifact becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

card.name: Harl's Hornblower
card.text: Double strike When this creature enters, mill four cards. Put a creature card with power 2 or less from among the cards milled this way into your hand.

card.name: Save What You Can
card.text: Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards plus one. When you do, return target nonland permanent card with mana value less than or equal to than the number of cards discarded this way from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Borohd, Wartemper Artisan
card.text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card. Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, create a Weapon token and attach it to a creature you control. (It's an Equipment artifact token with equip {2} and "Equipped creature gets +1/+1".)

card.name: Sunheart Greatsword
Thanewrought Reclaimer
card.text: When this creature enters, create two 1/1 red Dwarf creature tokens. If a card would leave your graveyard, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, put that card into your hand instead of anywhere else.

card.name: Bugrund, Firehearth's Last
card.text: Double strike, trample Arise {3}{R}{W} ({3}{R}{W}, Exile this from your graveyard as a sorcery: Create a black token of it that's also a Zombie and can't block.) When Bugrund arises, you may put an Equipment card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield attached to it.

card.name: Aravant Welcome
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards. Target player draws two cards. Return up to one target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Daring Windraider
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If you do, another target Pirate or Rogue gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Beherzt, Sofia's Second
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Pirates and Rogues you control get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn. Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Alchemical Warfare
card.text: Return up to two target instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand, then you may cast an instant or sorcery card with mana value 2 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost. Exile Alchemical Warfare.

card.name: Blow the Man Down
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. When it enters the battlefield as a creature, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.

card.name: Santriza Despoilers
card.text: When this creature enters, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw two cards. Other Pirates and Rogues you control get +1/+1. Once each turn, when you discard a card, you may create a 1/1 red Pirate creature token.

card.name: Lysene, Shrewd Smuggler
card.text: Spells you cast from anywhere other than your hand cost {1} less to cast. At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target Pirate or Rogue you control gets +X/+0 and gains haste until end of turn, where X is the number of noncreature spells you've cast this turn. That creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Dewdrop Crescendo
card.text: Siphon (Each -1/-1 counter you put on your creatures up to their remaining toughness while casting this pays for {1}.) Create an X/X green and blue Dryad creature token with ward {2}.

card.name: Deepwilds Survivor
card.text: When this creature enters or leaves the battlefield, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Glenach, Gossamer Monarch
card.text: Flying When Glenach enters, put three -1/-1 counters on a creature you control. When Glenach leaves the battlefield, return target non-Insect permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Petalsnare
card.text: Choose any number of target nonland permanents each controlled by different players. For each of those permanents, return it to its owner's hand. If you returned a permanent you controlled this way, create a 3/3 green Plant Elemental creature token with reach.

card.name: Gwynsivir's Pathfinder
card.text: When this creature enters, if you cast it, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. If it's a nonland card with mana value less than or equal to the number of lands you control, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you do neither, put it into your hand.

card.name: Branu of the Dewdrops
card.text: Flash Flying When Branu enters, return up to one other target creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it has base power and toughness 1/1.

card.name: Stirring of the Run
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may return target nontoken creature you control with a different name to its owner's hand. If you do, copy that spell. (A copy of a creature spell becomes a token.)

card.name: Awakened Hunger
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its toughness to another target creature.

card.name: Bloodbriar Bat-Rider
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature with one or more counters on it. Flying, vigilance

card.name: Vernal Decay

card.name: Abaran the Haunted
card.text: When Abaran enters, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with the greatest toughness among creatures on the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Abominable Quarry
card.text: Menace When this creature enters or dies, each opponent creates a 1/2 green Scout creature token. {B}{G}, Discard this card: Distribute two -1/-1 counters among one or two target creatures. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.text: Imisti enters with a concoction counter on it for each land card in your graveyard. {1}{G}, Remove any number of concoction counters from Imisti: You gain that much life. {3}{B}, Remove any number of concoction counters from Imisti: It deals that much damage to target creature or planeswalker.

card.text: Menace Whenever Coirchanh deals combat damage to a player, return up to one target creature card with toughness 4 or greater from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. {1}{G}: This creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

card.text: Flash Lifelink When this creature enters, counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} or 3 life.

card.name: Caer Crann Collaborator

card.text: Whenever a player casts a non-Dwarf spell or plays a non-Mountain land, this creature deals 2 damage to that player. {1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Dwarf or Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Vengeful Alchemist
card.text: Whenever another creature you control dies, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever this creature attacks, you may pay {2}{R} and sacrifice another creature. If you do, this creature gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Abaran's Quarry
card.text: Up to one target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn. Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target blocking or blocked creature.

card.name: Acolyte of the Rose Order
card.text: {T}: Untap target land. {4}{G}: This creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Alliance's Aid
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target artifact. • Exile target creature with flying. • Exile target card in a graveyard.

card.name: Apex's Prey
card.text: If this spell was foretold, target player creates a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying. Apex's Prey deals damage equal to the greatest power among creatures you control to up to one target creature or planeswalker. Foretell {1}{R}{R}{G}

card.name: Bleakfell Escort
card.text: When this creature enters, create a 1/1 white Peasant creature token. {W}, {T}: Tap target creature with power X or less, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Blightbound Archer
card.text: Reach When this creature enters, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control.

card.name: Caer Crann Survivalists
card.text: Vigilance When this creature enters, you gain life equal to the greatest toughness among other creatures you control.

card.name: Coirchanh's Herald
card.text: This creature has trample as long as there are four or more -1/-1 counters among creatures. {3}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Coirchanh's Invocation
card.text: Creatures you control without counters on them get +2/+2. Whenever you attack, target attacking creature gains trample until end of turn. At the beginning of your end step, put two -1/-1 counters on a creature you control or sacrifice this enchantment.

card.name: Costly Ambush
card.text: Siphon (Each -1/-1 counter you put on your creatures up to their remaining toughness while casting this pays for {1}.) Costly Ambush deals damage equal to the greatest power among creatures you control to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Daring Sortie
card.text: Create a 1/1 red Dwarf creature token and a 1/1 green Elf creature token. If this spell was foretold, Dwarves and Elves you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn. Foretell {2}{G} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Deepwood Hermit
card.text: When this creature enters, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Desperate Retreat
card.text: Siphon (Each -1/-1 counter you put on your creatures up to their remaining toughness while casting this pays for {1}.) Search your library for up to two Forest cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Esalia, the Enduring Root
card.text: Whenever another creature you control enters, put your choice of a vigilance, trample or reach counter on this creature. {T}, Remove a counter from this creature: Add one mana of any color. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, you may have it enter the battlefield with an additional counter of that kind on it.

card.name: Esalia's Witness
card.text: When this creature enters, you may return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If you don't, it seeks secrets. (Give it that Oath Aura. Fulfill it by attacking with it and two or more other creatures to draw a card.)

card.name: Fencas the Fallen
card.text: Reach {G}, Sacrifice Fencas: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. At the beginning of your end step, if you control seven or more lands, return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Friendly Rivalry
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a tally counter on this enchantment. If it was a Dwarf or Elf, put two on it instead. Remove two tally counters from this enchantment: Draw a card.

card.name: From the Treetops
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each of up to two other target creatures. • Create a 5/5 green Treefolk creature token with reach.

card.name: Gwynsivir, the Listener
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, return any number of creatures you control to their owner's hands. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature returned this way. Whenever Gwynsivir attacks, if a creature entering causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger this turn, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Horseman of Pestilence
card.text: Whenever another creature dies, you gain 2 life. If you controlled that creature, draw a card. Whenever this creature enters or attacks, put two -1/-1 counters on up to one target creature with power less than this creature's power.

card.name: Joyous Reveler
card.text: Trample Whenever this creature attacks, if you control three or more other creatures, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Kiss from a Rose
card.text: Mill three cards. You may put a permanent card from among the milled cards into your hand. If this spell was foretold, you gain 4 life. Foretell {2}{G} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Levy Bowmen
card.text: Reach {2}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: It deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Llech Crann Knight
card.text: Trample When this creature enters, it seeks secrets or valor. (Give it that Oath Aura. Fulfill Secrets by attacking with it and two or more other creatures to draw a card. Fulfill Valor by dealing combat damage to a player to create a 2/1 white Soldier token.)

card.name: Militia's Charge
card.text: Flash Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Whenever enchanted creature attacks, if it's a Citizen or Peasant, create a 1/1 white Peasant creature token.

card.name: Moontouched Courser
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, for each permanent with exactly one counter on it, you may choose one — • Remove all counters from that permanent. • Choose a kind of counter on that permanent. Put another counter of that kind on that permanent.

card.name: Oath of the Wildlords
card.text: Search your library for a nongreen creature card with mana value X or less and put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. That creature seeks secrets or valor. (Give it that Oath Aura. Fulfill Secrets by attacking with it and two or more other creatures to draw a card. Fulfill Valor by dealing combat damage to a player to create a 2/1 white Soldier token.)

card.name: Pestilent Procession
card.text: Siphon (Each -1/-1 counter you put on your creatures up to their remaining toughness while casting this pays for {1}.) Creatures you control get +3/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Rundfora Trickster
card.text: Changeling (This card is every creature type.) This creature enters with four -1/-1 counters on it. Whenever another creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, remove a -1/-1 counter from this creature.

card.name: The Rundfora's Last Gift
card.text: Siphon (Each -1/-1 counter you put on your creatures up to their remaining toughness while casting this pays for {1}.) Draw X cards, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. Then you may put a permanent card with mana value X or less from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Rundfora's Resistance
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If this spell was foretold, it gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead. Foretell {1}{G} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Scion of Coirchanh
card.text: When this creature enters, you may put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control. If you do, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Settled Giant
card.text: This creature can't be blocked by creatures with power less than the number of creatures you control. {3}{G}: Create a 1/1 white Peasant creature token.

card.name: Sheltering Gargantuan
card.text: When this creature enters, draw a card, then put a creature you control on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Stilthorpe Memorialist
card.text: Whenever this creature or another Citizen or Peasant you control enters, you may exile target card from a graveyard. If you exile a creature card this way, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Strongarm Militia
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, up to two target Citizens or Peasants each get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Surface Envoy
card.text: When this creature dies, if you control another Dwarf or Elf, draw a card.

card.name: Sustaining Katlig
card.text: When this creature enters, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance until end of turn. You may remove a counter from that creature.

card.name: Sofia, Haunted by Fortune
The Usurper's Final Rest
card.text: As The Usurper's Final Rest enters, choose a card name. Spells with the chosen name can't be cast. If a card with the chosen name would enter the battlefield or be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Rose Court Sentinel
card.text: Flash {3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card.

card.name: A Farmer's Life
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, create a Field land token with "{T}, Sacrifice this land: Add one mana of any color." Whenever a nontoken land you control enters, create a 1/1 white Peasant creature token.

card.name: Stand as One
card.text: Choose one. If you control four or more creatures, you may choose any number instead. • Exile target artifact or enchantment. • Exile target player's graveyard. Stand as One deals 1 damage to each opponent for each card type among cards exiled this way. • Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Maritou's Pride
card.text: This creature costs {2} less to cast if you foretold a card this turn. Whenever this creature enters or attacks, draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down. It becomes foretold. (If it doesn't have foretell, you can't cast it later.)

card.name: Rose Queen's Absolution
card.text: Nonland permanents lose all abilities until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Spellstrider Ettin
card.text: Whenever this creature enters, attacks, or leaves the battlefield, choose one that hasn't been chosen. • Return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. • Draw two cards. • Create three 1/1 blue Bird creature tokens with flying. • Add {U}{U}{U}{U}. You can't spend this mana to cast creature spells.

card.name: Scorching Condemnation
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Players can't gain life. {1}{R}: This enchantment becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature with trample and haste in addition to its other types until end of turn. Activate only during your turn.

card.name: Esoteric Alliances
card.text: Search your library for a creature card with trample, one with haste, one with vigilance, and one with reach each with different names and reveal them. An opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: The Dreadmoon Ascendancy
card.text: When The Dreadmoon Ascendancy enters, you may put two -1/-1 counters on target creature. Whenever you put one or more counters on one or more other permanents, you may put a bale counter on The Dreadmoon Ascendancy. {B}, Pay 1 life, Remove a bale counter from The Dreadmoon Ascendancy: Draw a card.
